name: Ruins at Time's Edge
overview: Ruins at Time's Edge is a text adventure game for the TRS-80. You are Jagar - barbarian, thief, mercenary, and treasure seeker. You have arrived at the Ruins at Time's edge, where you have heard rumors that the world's largest diamond lies hidden within. You must infiltrate the ruins, and evade the horrors within. You must explore lands outside of time, and locate the lost diamond. This must then be returned to the player's starting area. All commands are via VERN NOUN entry, and there are several inventory-based puzzles. There is a save and restore feature available.
